#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int t;
string s;

inline string shr(string s)
{
    string tmp = "";
    tmp.push_back(s[s.size() - 1]);
    s.erase(s.size() - 1, 1);

    s = tmp + s;
    while (s[0] == '0') s.erase(0, 1);

    return s;
}

inline string shl(string s)
{
    char tmp = s[0];
    s.erase(0, 1);
    s.push_back(tmp);

    while (s[0] == '0') s.erase(0, 1);

    return s;
}

string my_max(string s1, string s2)
{
    if (s1.size() > s2.size()) return s1;
    else if (s2.size() > s1.size()) return s2;
    else
    {
        for (int i = 0; i < s1.size(); i++) if (s1[i] > s2[i]) return s1;
        else if (s2[i] > s1[i]) return s2;
    }
    return s1;
}

inline int toint(string s)
{
    int res = 0;

    for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) res = res * 10 + s[i] - '0';

    return res;
}

int main()
{
    cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin >> t;

    while (t--)
    {
        cin >> s;

        string Ans = "";
        Ans = my_max(shr(shl(s)), Ans);
        Ans = my_max(Ans, shl(shr(s)));

        string tmp = s;

        for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++) {s = shl(s); Ans = my_max(Ans, s);}
        s = tmp;
        for (int i = 0; i < 12; i++) {s = shr(s); Ans = my_max(Ans, s);}

        printf("%d\n", toint(Ans));
    }

    return 0;
}
